mitigationStrategies.title: Enhance Data Protection Compliance
mitigationStrategies.description: Implement comprehensive data protection measures to align with Saudi data protection regulations.
mitigationStrategies.rationale: Critical gap in data handling and privacy protection requirements

citations.excerpt: Organizations must implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect personal data.

mitigationStrategies.title: Streamline Resource Requirements
mitigationStrategies.description: Optimize resource allocation and reduce operational overhead through process automation.
mitigationStrategies.rationale: High resource demands may impact implementation feasibility

citations.excerpt: Efficient resource management is key to successful policy implementation.
Working hours shall not exceed eight hours per day or forty-eight hours per week.
Personal data processing must be lawful, fair, and transparent.
